entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, single_query #60827
  • Perf improvement: httpsys-hostheader-mismatch #60826
  • TimingPipeFlusher.FlushAsync Kestrel exception running inside Aspire with Orleans #60825

Closed

  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-validation, multiple_queries #60823
  • Perf regression: caching #60824
  • Introduce a .HasValue property for strings #60795

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more schema tests #60822
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Updated

  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e235eb3` to `24a9e94` #60677
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e235eb3` to `24a9e94` #60678
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • Fix self-referential schema handling in collection schemas #60410
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.x
  • [Blazor] Opt-in to use dotnet.boot.js #60751
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Split analyzers and code fix providers into different assemblies (but same package) #35752

Merged

    community-contribution

  • Add support for complex type discriminator. #35744

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • GradientStop with a Color Binding of RelativeSource throws a System.NullReferenceException #19253
    Backlog
  • Popup with an Entry or Editor at bottom goes off screen from top when keyboard comes up #27435
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

Merged

Updated

    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview, collectionview-cv2
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Applying global styles to shadows #20203
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Android Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride #20179

    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializerOptions is not accepted for JsonSerializer.Deserialize #77474
  • IDE0025 code fixer changes semantics and sometimes suggests invalid code. #77473
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.13.0 causes build error Error CS0234 : The type or namespace name .. does not exist in the namespace .. (are you missing an assembly reference?) #77472

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35907.16 #77469

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77467
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SerialPort constantly throws IOException #113296
  • Numerics.Vector.SinCos() bug #113295
  • DotnetFuzzing doesn't compile on linux succesfully #113285

Closed

  • API proposal: Stream with BaseStream #31002
  • .NET Core 8 Process StandardIn and Close() Failures #113289
  • Self-assignment instead of delegate creation #111031
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Bounds check for "i + cns < arrlen" bound #112523
  • [API Proposal]: Unicode-aware mode for Regex #113290
  • [wasm] Out of memory exception in System.Xml.XmlWriterApiTests.TCFullEndElement tests #110090
  • [Mono/x64] MutualThdRecur-fptr test crash #102995
    Future
  • how to keep assemblyloadcontext alive after call Unload #113122
  • Brew command passes (now invalid) --no-lock parameter #113276

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Introduce `LclVarDsc::lvIsMultiRegDest` #113294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace `Unsafe.As` with `Unsafe.Read{Write}Unaligned` #113293
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Expand capability of CoreCLR Interpreter #113292
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [mono] vector intrinsics fixes #113288
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Switch generic instance cache back to GHashTable; improve ginst hash function #113287
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Support bitwise field insertions for return registers #113178
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Coalesce ifdef blocks #113284
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fixup null annotations from ClaimsPrincipal #113258
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove --no-lock brew flag #113281
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove --no-lock brew flag #113282
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove use of --no-lock with Homebrew. #113277
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Switch `optOptimizeLayout` to pre-layout optimization phase #113224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • OSDescription: Returns a user-friendly name instead of kernel info on Android & Apple platforms #113041
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-android, os-ios, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0][browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113271
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Remove experimental args from NodeJS WBT runner #113008
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Refactor `CertFreeCRLContext` #112207
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][infra] Refactor running condition for runtime-ioslike and runtime-llvm pipelines #111967
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Improve wrapper method inliner heuristic #113266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 1: Use templates to specialize gc info encoder/decoder #113223
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Skip inbuild projects in stage2 (built by stage1) #113243
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Remove helper method frames from Monitors #113242
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Include xmmintrin.h early on x86 as well #113279
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Switch simdhash to prime bucket counts; increase load factor #113274
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [APX] Complete EGPR encoding in X64 backend #113237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 9.0.200 breaks "dotnet workload restore ..\some.sln" #47390

Closed

  • Default `--interactive` to `true` across the commands #35165
    10.0.1xx
  • MAUI Apps cannot be restored in locked mode. #41317
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove interactive special case #47389
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up extensions for dotnet CLI & Utils #47373
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • [Github Actions] Remove Branch Lockdown Labels on Branding Merge #47371
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --interactive by default for sessions that are local. #47226
    untriaged, Document for new feature, cli-ux
  • vs-solutionpersistence: 1.0.28 -> 1.0.52 #47328
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2658528 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers, DO NOT MERGE
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fixup sourcelink information #47363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • NuGetPackageDownloader: Only verify signing on windows by default #47321
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
